Subject: Last day of Course Advising & Registration without Fine
Holiday: Shaheed Dibash & International Mother language day
Orientation Program: All Undergraduate & Graduate Programs at 3:00 PM
Last day to drop course(s) with 100% adjustable refund only
Last day to apply for Grade Change of a course (if any) of Fall 2024 Trimester/Semester.Note: No application will be considered after the deadline.
Last day of Grade Submission for Project/ Thesis (Final Year Design Project)/ Internship/ Research Project
Last day of Course Advising & Registration with a Fine of Tk. 500/-
Last day of Grade Submission of Incomplete Grades of Fall 2024 Trimester/Semester by concerned Department/Program Office
Last day to drop course(s) with 50% adjustable refund only
1st installment: A fine of Tk. 500/- will be imposed if 40% Tuition Fee and Trimester Fee is not paid within this date.Transportation fee, if applicable, must be paid in full (no installment)
2nd installment: A fine of Tk. 500/- will be imposed if 70% Tuition Fee and Trimester Fee is not paid within this date.
3rd installment: A fine of Tk. 500/- will be imposed if 100% Tuition Fee and Trimester Fee is not paid within this date.
